p: Antifungal activity was determined against C. neoformans ATCC90113. The results showed that globosuxanthone E 294 displayed antifungal activity against Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC90113 with the MIC value of 32 μg/mL. Amphotericin B was used as a positive control for antifungal activity and exhibited an MIC value of 0.5 μg/mL [ 96].
